data.name: Sorcerer's Tournament
data.detailed_description:
Sorcerer's Tournament is a turn-based RPG with mini-games for training your character, gameplay is focused on growing and improving between each duel.
As you win duels and tournaments you will permanently unlock new spells, modes and difficulties.


Winning Through Sheer Force Is Not The Only Option

In this game's duels you will face opponents that might out-last you rather than out-damage you.



Train Your Student And Manage Your Time Carefully

Use the time you have to train carefully as an extra damage might not be as important as learning that new spell.

Features Include

  • learn unique spells that can fuse with modifiers into 110 spell combinations
  • choose the school and student
  • play challenging mini-games training each major stat
  • unlock special game modes
  • fight magic battles to your heart's content!
